maqras.text: aur meree yaatana hee duhkhadaayee yaatana hai
aur aap unhen ibraaheem ke atithiyon ke baare mein soochit kar den
jab ve ibraaheem ke paas aaye, to salaam kiya. usane kahaah vaastav mein, ham tumase dar rahe hain
unhonne kahaah daro nahin, ham tumhen ek gyaanee baalak kee shubh soochana de rahe hain
usane kahaah kya tumane mujhe is budhaape mein shubh soochana dee hai, tum mujhe ye shubh soochana kaise de rahe ho
unhonne kahaah hamane tumhen saty shubh soochana dee hai, atah tum niraash na ho
(ibraaheem) ne kahaah apane paalanahaar kee daya se niraash, keval kupath log hee hua karate hain
usane kahaah he allaah ke bheje hue farishto! tumhaara abhiyaan kya hai
unhonne uttar diya ki ham ek aparaadhee jaati ke paas bheje gaye hain
loot ke gharaane ke siva, unasabhee ko ham bachaane vaale hain
parantu loot kee patni ke lie hamane nirnay kiya hai ki vah peechhe rah jaane vaalon mein hogee
phir jab loot ke ghar bheje hue (farishte) aaye
to loot ne kahaah tum (mere lie) aparichit ho
unhonne kahaah daro nahin, balki ham tumhaare paas vo (yaatana) laaye hain, jisake baare mein ve sandeh kar rahe the
ham tumhaare paas saty laaye hain aur vaastav mein, ham satyavaadee hain
atah kuchh raat rah jaaye, to apane gharaane ko lekar nikal jao aur tum unake peechhe raho aur tumamen se koee phirakar na dekhe tatha chale jao, jahaan aadesh diya ja raha hai
aur hamane loot ko nirnay suna diya ki bhor hote hee inaka unmoolan kar diya jaayega
aur nagar vaasee prasann hokar aa gaye
loot ne kahaah ye mere atithi hain, atah mera apamaan na karo
tatha allaah se daro aur mera anaadar na karo
unhonne kahaah kya hamane tumhen vishv vaasiyon se nahin roka[1] tha
loot ne kahaah ye meree putriyaan hain, yadi tum kuchh karane vaale[1] ho
he nabee! aapakee aayu kee shapath[1]! vaastav mein, ve apane unmaad mein bahak rahe the
antatah, sooryoday ke samay unhen ek kadee dhvani ne pakad liya
phir hamane us bastee ke ooparee bhaag ko neeche kar diya aur unapar kankareele patthar barasa diye
vaastav mein, isamen kaee nishaaniyaan hain, pratibhaashaaliyon[1] ke lie
aur vah (bastee) saadhaaran[1] maarg par sthit hai
nihsandeh isamen badee nishaanee hai, eemaan valon ke lie
aur vaastav mein, (aiyka) ke[1] vaasee atyaachaaree the
to hamane unase badala le liya aur ve donon[1] hee saadhaaran maarg par hain
aur haî€¼ijr ke[1] logon ne rasoolon ko jhuthalaaya
aur unhen hamane apanee aayaten (nishaaniyaan) deen, to ve unase vimukh hee rahe
ve shilaakaaree karake parvaton se ghar banaate aur nirbhay hokar rahate the
antatah, unhen kadee dhvani ne bhor ke samay pakad liya
aur unakee kamaee unake kuchh kaam na aayee

aur hamane aakaashon tatha dharatee ko aur jo kuchh un donon ke beech hai, saty ke aadhaar par hee utpann kiya hai aur nishchay pralay aanee hai. atah (he nabee!) aap (unhen) bhale taur par kshama kar den
vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee sabaka sreshta, sarvagy hai
tatha (he nabee!) hamane aapako saat aisee aayaten, jo baar-baar duharaee jaatee hain aur maha quraan[1] pradaan kiya hai
aur aap, usakee or na dekhen, jo saansaarik laabh ka sansaadhan hamane unamen se vibhinn prakaar ke logon ko de rakha hai aur na unapar shok karen aur eemaan vaalon ke lie susheel rahen
aur kah den ki main pratyaksh (khulee) chetaavanee[1] dene vaala hoon
jaise hamane khandan kaariyon[1] par (yaatana) utaaree
jinhonne quraan ko khand-khand kar diya
to shapath hai aapake paalanahaar kee. ham unase avashy poochhenge
tum kya karate rahe
atah aapako, jo aadesh diya ja raha hai, use kholakar suna den aur mushrikon (mishramavaadiyon) kee chinta na karen
ham aapake lie parihaas karane vaalon ko kaafee hain
jo allaah ke saath doosare poojy bana lete hain, to unhen sheeghr gyaan ho jaayega
aur ham jaanate hain ki unakee baaton se aapaka dil sankuchit ho raha hai
atah aap apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen tatha sajda karane vaalon mein rahen
aur apane paalanahaar kee ibaadat (vandana) karate rahen, yahaan tak ki aapake paas vishvaas aa jaaye
